message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a price of $12000 for the product. This offer includes an exclusive 1-year warranty and priority customer support.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget considerations. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $10500. This includes all the features you're looking for plus some additional benefits that I believe will be valuable to you.

I appreciate the additional benefits you mentioned, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10000. I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price is a fair compromise.
